snippet: Ministers and theologians who came of age during the civil rights era are being replaced by those, like the Rev. Jonathan L. Walton, of elite universities, the diversity movement and hip-hop culture.
abstract: Appointment of Rev Jonathan L Walton as Pusey minister of Memorial Church at Harvard, pulpit of importance inside and outside university, forms part of generational transition in African-American church; ministers and theologians who came of age during civil rights era are being supplanted by those, like Walton, of elite universities, diversity movement and hip-hop culture.
lead_paragraph: Ministers and theologians who came of age during the civil rights era are being replaced by those, like the Rev. Jonathan L. Walton, of elite universities, the diversity movement and hip-hop culture.

headline.seo: A Shift in Black Christianity as Harvard Installs a Minister
headline.main: Generational Shift in Black Christianity Comes to Harvard
headline.print_headline: Generational Shift In Black Christianity Comes to Harvard
